abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Broadway Silk Store in Astoria, Queens, anchor in neighborhood since the Great Depression.
lead_paragraph: A purveyor of fabric and costume jewelry, Broadway Silk Store, in Astoria, Queens, has been an anchor in the neighborhood since the Depression.
snippet: A purveyor of fabric and costume jewelry, Broadway Silk Store, in Astoria, Queens, has been an anchor in the neighborhood since the Depression.

headline.main: Where Elmo’s People Shop: Broadway Silk Store in Astoria
